languages.text: {n}Сияющие глаза Ардженты неуловимо меняются, начиная напоминать раскаленные угли.{/n} "Быть может, это проклятое место все же повлияло на тебя... То, что ты говоришь — безумие сродни ереси, ибо ты хочешь обезглавить сопротивление, оставить без лидера тех, кто в своем сердце хранит верность Ему! Я не могу позволить этому произойти, Вольный Торговец — надеюсь, что ты и не собираешься на самом деле претворять этот план в реальность".

{n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."
languages.original_text: {n}Сияющие глаза Ардженты неуловимо меняются, начиная напоминать раскаленные угли.{/n} "Быть может, это проклятое место все же повлияло на тебя... То, что ты говоришь — безумие сродни ереси, ибо ты хочешь обезглавить сопротивление, оставить без лидера тех, кто в своем сердце хранит верность Ему! Я не могу позволить этому произойти, Вольный Торговец — надеюсь, что ты и не собираешься на самом деле претворять этот план в реальность".

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの瞳が微妙に変化し、まるで燃えさしのように輝き始めた。{/n}「おそらくこの呪われた地があなたを苦しめ変えてしまったのだろう…あなたは異端にも等しい狂気を口にしている。抵抗勢力の首を切り落とし、この忠実な信仰者たちを指導者なしに放置することになるのだぞ！自由開拓者よ、そんなことはさせられない。その計画を本気で実行するつもりがないことを願うわ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの瞳が微妙に変化し、まるで燃えさしのように輝き始めた。{/n}「おそらくこの呪われた地があなたを苦しめ変えてしまったのだろう…あなたは異端にも等しい狂気を口にしている。抵抗勢力の首を切り落とし、この忠実な信仰者たちを指導者なしに放置することになるのだぞ！自由開拓者よ、そんなことはさせられない。その計画を本気で実行するつもりがないことを願うわ」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的眼神发生了微妙的变化，看起来像是发光的余烬一样。{/n}“或许这个被诅咒的地方终究对你产生了影响……你所说的疯狂行径，无异于异端暴行。因为如果你杀了政委，整个反抗军就会变得群龙无首，这些坚如磐石的战士也会变为一盘散沙！我决不允许发生这种事情，行商浪人，我希望你不要真的打算执行这个计划。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的眼神发生了微妙的变化，看起来像是发光的余烬一样。{/n}“或许这个被诅咒的地方终究对你产生了影响……你所说的疯狂行径，无异于异端暴行。因为如果你杀了政委，整个反抗军就会变得群龙无首，这些坚如磐石的战士也会变为一盘散沙！我决不允许发生这种事情，行商浪人，我希望你不要真的打算执行这个计划。”

languages.text: {n}Se produce un sutil cambio en los ojos relucientes de Argenta, que comienzan a asemejarse a brasas incandescentes.{/n} «Quizá este lugar maldito le haya afectado, después de todo... Habla de una afrenta que roza la herejía, ¡pues supondría decapitar la resistencia y dejar a estos valientes inquebrantables, a Sus fieles, sin su líder! No puedo tolerarlo, Comerciante Independiente, y espero que usted tampoco tenga intención de ejecutar tal plan».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se produce un sutil cambio en los ojos relucientes de Argenta, que comienzan a asemejarse a brasas incandescentes.{/n} «Quizá este lugar maldito le haya afectado, después de todo... Habla de una afrenta que roza la herejía, ¡pues supondría decapitar la resistencia y dejar a estos valientes inquebrantables, a Sus fieles, sin su líder! No puedo tolerarlo, Comerciante Independiente, y espero que usted tampoco tenga intención de ejecutar tal plan».

languages.text: {n}In Argentas glimmenden Augen hat sich etwas verändert, und sie beginnen, glühender Kohle zu ähneln.{/n} "Vielleicht hat sich diese verfluchte Hölle doch auf Euch ausgewirkt ... Ihr sprecht von Wahnsinn, der Ketzerei gleichkommt, denn Ihr würdet den Widerstand köpfen und diese tapferen Herzen, diese Gläubigen des Imperators, ohne Anführer zurücklassen! Das kann ich nicht zulassen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, und ich hoffe, Ihr habt nicht vor, diesen Plan wirklich umzusetzen."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Argentas glimmenden Augen hat sich etwas verändert, und sie beginnen, glühender Kohle zu ähneln.{/n} "Vielleicht hat sich diese verfluchte Hölle doch auf Euch ausgewirkt ... Ihr sprecht von Wahnsinn, der Ketzerei gleichkommt, denn Ihr würdet den Widerstand köpfen und diese tapferen Herzen, diese Gläubigen des Imperators, ohne Anführer zurücklassen! Das kann ich nicht zulassen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, und ich hoffe, Ihr habt nicht vor, diesen Plan wirklich umzusetzen."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux d'Argenta, qui brillaient jusque-là de ferveur, deviennent deux charbons ardents.{/n} « Vous devez vous aussi avoir subi l'influence de ce lieu maudit... Ce que vous dites n'est que pure folie, si ce n'est une complète hérésie ! Vous seriez {mf|prêt|prête} à décapiter la résistance, privant par là même tous ces cœurs vaillants de leur chef ? Je ne le permettrai pas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et j'espère sincèrement que vous n'avez pas l'intention de mettre votre plan à exécution. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux d'Argenta, qui brillaient jusque-là de ferveur, deviennent deux charbons ardents.{/n} « Vous devez vous aussi avoir subi l'influence de ce lieu maudit... Ce que vous dites n'est que pure folie, si ce n'est une complète hérésie ! Vous seriez {mf|prêt|prête} à décapiter la résistance, privant par là même tous ces cœurs vaillants de leur chef ? Je ne le permettrai pas, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et j'espère sincèrement que vous n'avez pas l'intention de mettre votre plan à exécution. »

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın parıltılı gözlerinde ince bir değişiklik oluyor, âdeta alev alev yanmaya başlıyorlar.{/n} "Bu kahrolası ortam, seni de sarsmış belli ki... Ağzından böylesine delice laflar çıkması, kâfirlikle eş değerdir. Direnişin başını kesip İmparator'un sadık ve inatçı kullarını lidersiz bırakmış olursun! Bunun yaşanmasına izin veremem Hür Tacir. Umarım bu planı gerçekleştirmeyi ciddi ciddi düşünmüyorsundur."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a subtle change in Argenta's gleaming eyes, and they begin to resemble glowing embers.{/n} "Perhaps this accursed place has afflicted you after all... You speak of madness that is tantamount to heresy, for you would be beheading the resistance and leaving these adamant hearts, His faithful, without a leader! I cannot let that come to pass, Rogue Trader, and I hope you do not intend to execute this plan in earnest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın parıltılı gözlerinde ince bir değişiklik oluyor: Âdeta alev alev yanmaya başlıyorlar.{/n} "Bu kahrolası ortam, seni de sarsmış belli ki... Ağzından böylesine delice laflar çıkması, kâfirlikle eş değerdir çünkü direnişin başını kesip İmparator'un sadık ve inatçı kullarını lidersiz bırakmış olursun! Bunun yaşanmasına izin veremem Hür Tacir. Umarım bu planı gerçekleştirmeyi ciddi ciddi düşünmüyorsundur."
